title: Foundation & MVP Development (Weeks 1-8)
description: Core NthLayer platform completed Nov 14 - Dec 26, 2024. Includes: CLI framework, alert generation, SLO management, technology templates (PostgreSQL/Redis/Kubernetes), dashboard generation (40 panels), recording rules (21+), unified workflow (plan/apply), live demo infrastructure. 84/84 tests passing. See FOUNDATION_COMPLETE.md and archive/*_COMPLETE.md
